Title: Directs the MTA to rename the Eltingville transit center the Iraq War and Afghanistan War Veterans' Memorial Transit Center
Summary: Directs the MTA to rename the Eltingville transit center the Iraq War and Afghanistan War Veterans' Memorial Transit Center; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the metropolitan transportation authority to rename the Eltingville transit center the Iraq War and Afghanistan War Veterans' Memorial Transit Center; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
